channel.title: Garth Marenghi's Darkplace
channel.description:
Did anyone else watch the 6 episodes of that? I watched one like 5 years ago when I was younger and found it hilarious. I looked it up on youtube and all the episodes were up there so I just finished watching them and I haven't laughed hard at TV in a while.
Anyway's Garth Marenghi's Darkplace is an 80's hospital drama spoof.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nNfQ0ORwSDM http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OQtK33C-KrQ&feature=related http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fnob1BOf7Y0&feature=related
Have a watch if you have nothing better to do, I'm not promising you will find it funny either, so don't expect anything.
Enjoy!
P.S. The blonde girl in it reminds me of my girl for some reason :S
